You won't reach me!\""},{"lineNumber":221461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むーーーーりーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't!!!\""},{"lineNumber":221462,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの提案を、長田君は必死に拒否していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun was desperately rejecting your proposal."},{"lineNumber":221463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いけるいける」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can do it, you can do it.\""},{"lineNumber":221464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「適当に言うなーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't say that recklessly!\""},{"lineNumber":221465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ！　あっ！　あーーっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! Ah! Aah!?\""},{"lineNumber":221466,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶおん！","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoosh!"},{"lineNumber":221467,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは力の限り長田君を放り投げた！","translatedEnglishLine":"You threw Nagata-kun with all your might!"},{"lineNumber":221468,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君の体が宙を舞う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun’s body flew through the air."},{"lineNumber":221469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！　すごい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah! Amazing!"},{"lineNumber":221470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺、鳥になったみたい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I became a bird!\""},{"lineNumber":221471,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし残念。","translatedEnglishLine":"But unfortunately,"},{"lineNumber":221472,"originalJapaneseLine":"まったく飛距離が足りず","translatedEnglishLine":"he didn’t fly nearly far enough,"},{"lineNumber":221473,"originalJapaneseLine":"地に叩きつけられた長田君は粉々になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Nagata-kun smashed to the ground and was shattered."},{"lineNumber":221474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらー！　無理だって言ったじゃんー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See! I told you it was impossible!\""},{"lineNumber":221475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だろうな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I figured so.\""},{"lineNumber":221476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だろうなって言った！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You said 'you figured so'!?\""},{"lineNumber":221477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":221478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この旅で＜エール＞のことが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"On this journey, I think I've come to understand 'Yell'"},{"lineNumber":221479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し分かったような気がするよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"a little better.\""},{"lineNumber":221480,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの兄は苦笑を浮かべていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your brother had a wry smile."},{"lineNumber":221481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後は僕がやってみよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll try the rest.\""},{"lineNumber":221482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「諦めるなよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't give up!\""},{"lineNumber":221483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},

{"lineNumber":221484,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはバサーッと服を脱いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You flung off your clothes."},

{"lineNumber":221485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なんで脱いだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, why did you take your clothes off!?\""},{"lineNumber":221486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":221487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、マジでちょっと遊んでく？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, seriously, wanna play a little?\""},{"lineNumber":221488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahn!\""},{"lineNumber":221489,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの肌を見たことで長田君が割れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun cracked because he saw your skin."},{"lineNumber":221490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わー！　駄目駄目駄目！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, wah! No, no, no!"},{"lineNumber":221491,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こら、＜エール＞ちゃん！　はしたない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Yell-chan! That’s improper!\""},{"lineNumber":221492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":221493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そわそわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Restless...\""},{"lineNumber":221494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたまで脱いだら怒るわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you take your clothes off too, I'll get mad.\""},{"lineNumber":221495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はーい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, okay...\""},

{"lineNumber":221496,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふぁさっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fusha."},

{"lineNumber":221497,"originalJapaneseLine":"上着があなたの肩にかけられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"A jacket was draped over your shoulders."},

{"lineNumber":221498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やめなさい、まったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop it, really...\""},{"lineNumber":221499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……今回の旅で君がどんな子か、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... on this trip, I think I’ve come to understand what kind of person you are...\""},{"lineNumber":221500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し分かった気がするよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"a little.\""},{"lineNumber":221501,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義は完全に呆れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi was completely exasperated."},{"lineNumber":221502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後は僕がやるよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll handle the rest.\""},{"lineNumber":221503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……よし」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Alright.\""},{"lineNumber":221504,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱義がギリリと矢をつがえ、オーブに狙いをつける。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangi gritted his teeth, nocked an arrow, and aimed at the orb."},{"lineNumber":221505,"originalJapaneseLine":"真っ直ぐに獲物を睨みつける横顔は","translatedEnglishLine":"His profile, staring straight at his target,"},{"lineNumber":221506,"originalJapaneseLine":"日本刀の刃のように研ぎ澄まされていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was sharpened like the blade of a Japanese sword."},{"lineNumber":221507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「矢で取れるのかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder if I can get it with an arrow?\""},{"lineNumber":221508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オーブの下の方、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The lower part of the orb,"},{"lineNumber":221509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　衝撃を加えれば崩せるかも知れない。","translatedEnglishLine":"might be broken if I apply an impact."},{"lineNumber":221510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　狙うはそこだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s where I’m aiming.\""},{"lineNumber":221511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰か下で待機していてくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone wait down below.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで無理しなくてもいいのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You don't have to push yourself that hard...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義がかすかに笑みを浮かべる。
「この旅で、＜エール＞のことが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On this journey, I've come to understand 'Yell'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し分かった気がするよ」
「後は僕がやってみよう」
「無理無理無理無理無理無理無理！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, no, no, no, no, no, no!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無ーーー理ーーー！！！！」
「絶対に無理だって、そんな距離じゃねぇって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's absolutely impossible, that's not that kind of distance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺結構重いって！　届かねぇって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm pretty heavy! You won't reach me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むーーーーりーーーー！」
あなたの提案を、長田君は必死に拒否していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun was desperately rejecting your proposal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いけるいける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can do it, you can do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「適当に言うなーーー！」
「あっ！　あっ！　あーーっ！？」
ぶおん！
あなたは力の限り長田君を放り投げた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You threw Nagata-kun with all your might!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君の体が宙を舞う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun’s body flew through the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！　すごい！
俺、鳥になったみたい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I became a bird!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし残念。
まったく飛距離が足りず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he didn’t fly nearly far enough,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地に叩きつけられた長田君は粉々になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Nagata-kun smashed to the ground and was shattered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらー！　無理だって言ったじゃんー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See! I told you it was impossible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だろうな」
「だろうなって言った！？」
「この旅で＜エール＞のことが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On this journey, I think I've come to understand 'Yell'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し分かったような気がするよ」
あなたの兄は苦笑を浮かべていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your brother had a wry smile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後は僕がやってみよう」
「諦めるなよ！？」
あなたはバサーッと服を脱いだ。
「いや、なんで脱いだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, why did you take your clothes off!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え、マジでちょっと遊んでく？」
「あんっ」
あなたの肌を見たことで長田君が割れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun cracked because he saw your skin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わー！　駄目駄目駄目！
こら、＜エール＞ちゃん！　はしたない！」
「そわそわ……」
「あんたまで脱いだら怒るわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you take your clothes off too, I'll get mad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、はーい……」
ふぁさっ。
上着があなたの肩にかけられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A jacket was draped over your shoulders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめなさい、まったく……」
「はあ……今回の旅で君がどんな子か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sigh... on this trip, I think I’ve come to understand what kind of person you are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し分かった気がするよ……」
乱義は完全に呆れていた。
「後は僕がやるよ」
乱義がギリリと矢をつがえ、オーブに狙いをつける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi gritted his teeth, nocked an arrow, and aimed at the orb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真っ直ぐに獲物を睨みつける横顔は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His profile, staring straight at his target,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日本刀の刃のように研ぎ澄まされていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sharpened like the blade of a Japanese sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「矢で取れるのかな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if I can get it with an arrow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オーブの下の方、
衝撃を加えれば崩せるかも知れない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might be broken if I apply an impact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙うはそこだ」
「誰か下で待機していてくれ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

乱義がギリリと矢をつがえ、オーブに狙いをつける。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was sharpened like the blade of a Japanese sword.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if I can get it with an arrow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オーブの下の方、
衝撃を加えれば崩せるかも知れない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might be broken if I apply an impact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狙うはそこだ」
「誰か下で待機していてくれ」
